prompt: Image Prompt: Create an ethereal depiction of a radiant, majestic figure enveloped in divine light, emanating an overwhelming sense of purity and holiness. The figure should exude a sense of awe-inspiring presence, reflecting the transcendent nature of the holy God as described in Christian theology. Incorporate elements such as glowing aura, celestial surroundings, and a sense of reverence to capture the essence of the holiness of God in a visually captivating manner.
